definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
self-restraint and devotion to public duties (idiom); selfless dedication/to serve the public interest wholeheartedly

sentences.english: Live turkeys, pure-bred breeding animals, weighing not more than 185 g.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡，纯种繁殖用，重量185公克及以下者。

sentences.english: The kilogram of grapes I bought this morning was a few grams short.
sentences.chinese: 我早上买的一公斤的葡萄少了好几公克。

sentences.english: Live turkeys, other than pure-bred breeding animals, weighing not more than 185 g.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡，纯种繁殖用除外，重量185公克及以下者。

sentences.english: Divide it into 20 grams per piece .

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
twenty-fourth part of a tael (2 or 3 grams)
